lines.text: If you'd stop acting like an overheated teakettle, maybe we could get some sense into this conversation.
Are you trying to tell me you didn't plant that homesteader in that canyon just so he'd block my road?
I give you my word. I never even though of doing a thing like that!
Maybe he just hatched there from an egg.
Yeah? Well, maybe you're not so stupid as you look, but I doubt it.
